      • getPropertyValue

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPropertyValue(java.lang.String namespace,
                                                java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                boolean getLocalName)
        Get Entity Property Value as a String. For Resource properties, if getLocalName is set to true, Resource LocalName will be extracted, in other case Resource URI will be returned as property value
        Parameters:
        namespace - Property Namespace
        propertyName - Property Name
        getLocalName - Resources' LocalName extraction flag
        Returns:
        List of values for the Entity Property
